mapper.delete: DELETE cart_item_fees FROM cart_item_fees a LEFT JOIN cart_item_cart_item_fees b ON a.id=b.cart_item_fee_id LEFT JOIN cart_items c on c.id=b.cart_item_id LEFT JOIN carts d on d.id=c.cart_id WHERE d.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO [dbo].[cart_item_fees] (identifier, parent_id, name, description, type, transaction_type, units, unit_price, due_amount, created_by, created_dt, modified_by, modified_dt) VALUES (#{identifier}, #{parentId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{type}, #{transactionType}, #{units}, #{dueAmount}, #{unitPrice}, #{createdBy}, #{createdDt}, #{modifiedBy}, #{modifiedDt} )

INSERT INTO [dbo].[cart_item_cart_item_fees] (identifier, cart_item_id, cart_item_fee_id, created_by, created_dt, modified_by, modified_dt ) VALUES (#{identifier}, #{cartItemId}, #{cartItemFeeId}, #{createdBy}, #{createdDt}, #{modifiedBy}, #{modifiedDt} )
mapper.select: SELECT fee.identifier AS identifier, fee.id AS id, fee.parent_id AS parent_id, fee.name AS name, fee.description AS description, fee.type AS type, fee.transaction_type AS transaction_type, fee.units AS units, fee.unit_price AS unit_price, fee.due_amount AS due_amount, i.id AS cart_item_id FROM dbo.carts c LEFT JOIN dbo.cart_items i ON c.id=i.cart_id LEFT JOIN dbo.cart_item_cart_item_fees map ON map.cart_item_id=i.id LEFT JOIN dbo.cart_item_fees fee ON map.cart_item_fee_id = fee.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
